node.name: smb checklist
node.rich_text: What SMB protocols are in use? Did you scan associated UDP ports? Did you check for guest account access? DId you discover OS version? Did you enumerate users? Did you enumerate shares? Are weak or default credentials being used? Are IPC$ and ADMIN$ accessible? Did you browse the shares and exfiltrate data? Can you use PSExec? Can you authenticate (PTH)
